description: Extended operating hours may be needed in the event of a coronavirus outbreak, Douglas Council says.
title: Coronavirus: More staff to operate Isle of Man's crematorium
title_page: Coronavirus: More staff to operate Isle of Man's crematorium - BBC News
maintext: "If we do have to go to extended hours, or unfortunately some of our staff up there do fall ill and we're not able to carry out the cremations, we're going to ensure that we have sufficient staff available to operate the crematorium," he continued.
